00001 #ifndef _REDSPECIAL_H
00002 #define _REDSPECIAL_H
00003 
00004 
00005 class redclass_special
00006 {
00007    public: 
00008    
00009    int th_l;
00010    int th_h;
00011    double pmax;
00012    double pstart;
00013    double w_q;    // weight of last vaule for exponential averaging
00014    double avg;    // average queue size
00015    int count;
00016    int useaverage;
00017    
00018    double pb,pa;
00019    
00020    
00021    redclass_special()
00022    {
00023       pmax = 0.03; w_q = 0.002;  avg = 0; 
00024       count = -1, th_l = th_h = 0; pstart = 0.0;
00025       useaverage=1;
00026    }
00027    
00028    double uniform(){return my_rand() / 32767.0;} 
00029    
00030    int Update(int qlen)
00031    {
00032       if(useaverage)
00033          return UpdateWithAverage(qlen); 
00034       else
00035          return UpdateWithCurrent(qlen); 
00036    
00037    }
00038    
00039    
00040    int UpdateWithAverage(int qlen)
00041    {
00042    
00043       int drop = 0;
00044 
00045       avg = (1-w_q)*avg + w_q*qlen; // update avg queue size
00046       
00047 
00048       if(avg < th_l)
00049       {
00050          count++;
00051  
00052          // check, if to drop the packet
00053          if(uniform() <= pstart)
00054          {
00055             drop = 1;
00056             count = 0;
00057          }
00058       
00059       }
00060       if(th_l <= avg && th_h > avg)
00061       {
00062          count++;
00063          
00064          // calculate loss prob
00065          pb = pmax*(double)(avg-th_l)/(double)(th_h-th_l);
00066          pa = pb; // /(1.0-count*pb);
00067          
00068          // check, if to drop the packet
00069          if(uniform() <= pa)
00070          {
00071             drop = 1;
00072             count = 0;
00073          }
00074       } // avg is between the threshold
00075       else if(th_h <= avg)
00076       {
00077          drop = 1;
00078          count = 0;
00079       }
00080       else
00081          count = -1;
00082    
00083       return drop;
00084    
00085    }; // UpdateWithAverage
00086 
00087 
00088    int UpdateWithCurrent(int qlen)
00089    {
00090       int drop = 0;
00091    
00092       if(qlen < th_l)
00093          drop = 0;
00094       else if(qlen > th_h)
00095          if(uniform() <= pmax)
00096             drop = 1;
00097       else
00098       {
00099          double ploss;
00100          
00101          ploss = pmax * (double)(qlen-th_l) / (double)( th_h - th_l);
00102          if(uniform() <= ploss)
00103             drop = 1;
00104          else
00105             drop = 0;
00106       }
00107       
00108       return drop;
00109   
00110    } // UpdateWithCurrent
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114 
00115 }; // class redclass
00116 
00117 #endif  // _RED_H
